AboutPage.title: About Answer24
AboutPage.subtitle: We're on a mission to make Google Ads work better for everyone. No more guesswork, no more wasted budgets, no more complexity.

story.title: Our Story
story.content:
In today's digital world, running successful online ads has become overly complex and increasingly expensive. Small businesses were struggling to compete with enterprises that had dedicated marketing teams and unlimited budgets.

That's when we realized something had to change. We founded Answer24 with a simple belief: every business deserves access to world-class advertising technology, regardless of their size or budget.

We're not just another agency promising results. We're a technology-first platform that puts the power of AI-driven optimization directly in your hands, working 24/7 to make your ads smarter, more efficient, and more profitable.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize digital advertising by making advanced AI optimization accessible to businesses of all sizes. We believe every entrepreneur deserves the same powerful tools that enterprise companies use to dominate their markets.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where digital advertising is smarter, fairer, and more efficient for everyone. Where small businesses can compete on equal footing, and where success is determined by the quality of your product, not the size of your marketing budget.

values.title: What We Stand For
values.subtitle: Our values guide everything we do, from the features we build to the way we support our customers.

values.title: Simplicity First
values.description: We believe advertising should be simple, not complex. Our technology handles the complexity so you don't have to.

values.title: Results Driven
values.description: Every feature we build is designed to improve your ROI. We measure success by your success.

values.title: Customer Focused
values.description: We built Answer24 for real businesses with real challenges. Your feedback shapes our product.
